DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational post-market study subject receive Ovation™ Ovation Prime™ Abdominal Stent Graft System ( `` Ovation™ Ovation Prime™ Abdominal Stent Graft System Post-Market Study '' ) treatment abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) . The Ovation™ Ovation Prime™ Abdominal Stent Graft System Post-Market study intend expand clinical knowledge base collect data subject treat Ovation™ Ovation Prime™ Abdominal Stent Graft System actual clinical practice follow commercial approval .
DOC.criteria: Subject > 18 year minimum age require local regulation . Indication elective repair AAA endovascular stent graft accordance Instructions Use Ovation™ Ovation Prime™ Abdominal Stent Graft System . Subject sign Ethics Committee ( EC ) approve Informed Consent Form . The subject legal representative inform nature study , consent participate , authorize collection release his/her medical information . Subject intend electively receive Ovation™ Ovation Prime™ Abdominal Stent Graft System . Subject ability willingness comply followup exam indicate clinical investigation plan . Subject demonstrate high probability nonadherence physician 's followup requirement . Subject 's current participation concurrent randomize control trial ( RCT ) investigational device/drug study could confound study result . Life expectancy less 1 year Pregnancy Subjects poor renal function indicate serum creatinine > 2.5mg/dl .
